definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Now we are preparing to make all of Hainan Island a special economic zone, much larger than the others.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在搞一個更大的特區，這就是海南島經濟特區。

sentences.english: Prachanda also revealed that Nepal would establish special economic zones learning from China's successful experience.
sentences.chinese: 普拉昌達還說，尼泊爾會像中國一樣建立經濟特區。

sentences.english: The first is the Basic Program and the second is the Regional Center Pilot Program.
sentences.chinese: 第一基本綱領，第二經濟特區移民方案。

sentences.english: Since then, Hainan has grown to be the largest special economic zone in China.
sentences.chinese: 自那以後，海南成爲中國最大的經濟特區。

sentences.english: A young boy performs at an auditorium in the Special Economic Zone of Rason city.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩在羅津特別經濟特區的一個禮堂表演。

sentences.english: The special preferential tariff policies applied to SEZs had been eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 經濟特區適用的特殊優惠關稅政策已經取消。

sentences.english: Without the leadership of Party , there's no today of special economic zone.
sentences.chinese: 沒有黨的領導，就沒有經濟特區的今天。

sentences.english: The construction of special economic zones would have been impossible without the backing of the rest of the country.
sentences.chinese: 經濟特區的建設沒有國內其他地區作依託是不行的。

sentences.english: The SEZs and industrial clusters have made crucial contributions to China’s economic success.
sentences.chinese: 經濟特區和產業集羣爲中國的成功做出了重大貢獻。

sentences.english: Hainan's status as a special economic zone allowed it to be a testing ground in a country that was relatively new to pageantry.
sentences.chinese: 海南作爲經濟特區被允許作爲全國試點地區舉辦比賽。

sentences.english: It was set up as a special economic zone in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 它是90年代作爲經濟特區而建設的。

sentences.english: Other Renminbi and foreign currency deposits approved by SEZ branches.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民銀行經濟特區分行批准的其他本外幣存款。

sentences.english: Hutchison Entertainment operational headquarters in the Philippine city of Cagayan Special Economic Zone.
sentences.chinese: 和記娛樂城運營總部設於菲律賓卡格揚經濟特區。

sentences.english: Zhuhai city is one of the five special economic zones in China.
sentences.chinese: 珠海市，中國的五個經濟特區之一。

sentences.english: Shantou is one of China's five large Special Economic Zones.
sentences.chinese: 汕頭市是中國五大經濟特區之一。

sentences.english: They will expand mutual investment and explore the establishment of special economic zones in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 擴大相互投資，探討在俄合作建設經濟特區。

definition: Yantian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
abbr. for 自由貿易區|自由贸易区[zi4 you2 mao4 yi4 qu1]

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia
location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
abbr. for 東南亞國協|东南亚国协[Dong1 nan2 ya4 Guo2 Xie2]
